      • computeColorHistogram

        public static org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat computeColorHistogram(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat image,
                                                                         int nb_bins_per_channel)
        Computes the joint color histogram of the given image.
        Parameters:
        image - Image for which the histogram is computed.
        nb_bins_per_channel - Number of bins per channels (total size: nb_bins_per_channel ^ 3).
        Returns:
        The histogram as a row vector of doubles.
